import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';// use redux to use the nickname and room
var initialPlayerState={playersInRoom:[],gamingRoom:'',hostName:'',nickname:''};var playerSlice=createSlice({name:'player',initialState:initialPlayerState,reducers:{setPlayersInRoom:function setPlayersInRoom(state,action){state.playersInRoom=action.payload;},gamingRoom:function gamingRoom(state,action){state.gamingRoom=action.payload;},setHostName:function setHostName(state,action){state.hostName=action.payload;},setNickname:function setNickname(state,action){state.nickname=action.payload;}}});var _playerSlice$actions=playerSlice.actions,setPlayersInRoom=_playerSlice$actions.setPlayersInRoom,gamingRoom=_playerSlice$actions.gamingRoom,setHostName=_playerSlice$actions.setHostName,setNickname=_playerSlice$actions.setNickname;export{setPlayersInRoom,gamingRoom,setHostName,setNickname};export default playerSlice.reducer;
